meanings.definition: A large amount of items stored in a closet.
meanings.sent1: She had closetfuls of clothes she never wore.
meanings.sent2: The closetfuls of shoes made it hard to find a pair.
meanings.sent3: When she opened the closet, a tidal wave of closetfuls of clothes spilled out.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a closetfuls of memories, each neatly stored away.
meanings.sent5: The closetfuls of toys seemed to multiply overnight, filling every inch of space.

meanings.definition: The state of being filled with items in a closet.
meanings.sent1: The closetfuls of clutter made it impossible to close the door.
meanings.sent2: She loved the feeling of accomplishment when her closet was free of closetfuls of mess.
meanings.sent3: The closetfuls of clothes seemed to have a party of their own, mingling and mixing.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a closetfuls of emotions, bursting at the seams.
meanings.sent5: The closetfuls of secrets whispered softly, waiting to be discovered.
